title: Follow live: Celtics pulling away vs. Knicks in Game 5 to stay alive
author: ESPN staff

title: Eagles-Chiefs rematch in W2 as NFL sked unveiled
description: A rematch of Super Bowl LIX between the Philadelphia Eagles and Kansas City Chiefs will take place in Week 2 of the NFL season.

title: Forest's Awoniyi out of coma after surgery
description: Nottingham Forest forward Taiwo Awoniyi is no longer in an induced coma after having surgery to repair a serious abdominal injury.

title: I'm far from quitting as Man Utd coach - Amorim
description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says he has no intention of walking out on the Europa League finalists despite their domestic struggles.

title: Rory-Bryson rivalry renewed as McIlroy questions Masters comment
description: Rory McIlroy has brushed off Bryson DeChambeau's comment about not speaking to him during the final round of his Masters win last month, saying: "I don't know what he was expecting."

title: Amorim: I am far from quitting Man Utd job
description: Ruben Amorim has said he is far from quitting as Manchester United boss after warning he could walk away if results do not improve next season.

title: Dolphins have three potential cold-weather games in December and January
description: After the Dolphins lost at Green Bay on a cold Thanksgiving night, Miami linebacker Jordyn Brooks said the elements made them "soft."

title: Highlighting Packers' 5 primetime games on 2025 regular season schedule
description: The Packers have 5 primetime games once again in 2025. Here are the big games on Green Bay's schedule.
